articles.description: Sir David Attenborough narrates the latest series of Dynasties. Among the epic footage is the rare birth of twin elephants at Amboseli National Park in Kenya in the shadow of Mount Kilimanjaro.
articles.content: Everyone knows the hardships endured by wildlife film-makers the long days and weeks spent hunched in a hide, patiently waiting for a single glimpse of an elusive snow leopard or a black jaguar. For … [+7409 chars]

articles.title: Where Is Bad Vegan's Anthony Strangis Now? Everything To Know About Sarma Melngailis' Ex-Husband - Women's Health
articles.description: "I think it was mental abuse," Bad Vegan's executive producer Ryann Fraser told Women's Health.
articles.content: Netflix’s new true crime story Bad Vegan: Fame. Fraud. Fugitives just dropped, and it’s already getting plenty of buzz. The story follows the rise and fall of Sarma Melngailis, a famous New York City… [+3967 chars]
